statements: SELECT id, user_id, amount, payment_method, payment_status, payment_date FROM OnlinePayments;
SELECT * FROM OnlinePayments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card';
SELECT id, user_id, amount FROM OnlinePayments WHERE payment_status = 'Completed';
SELECT user_id, amount, payment_date FROM OnlinePayments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS num_payments FROM OnlinePayments GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY num_payments DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, payment_date FROM OnlinePayments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, payment_method FROM OnlinePayments WHERE payment_status = 'Paid' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT id, amount, payment_date FROM OnlinePayments WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' AND payment_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM OnlinePayments WHERE payment_method IN ('Credit Card', 'PayPal') ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT id, user_id, payment_method, payment_date FROM OnlinePayments WHERE payment_status = 'Pending' AND payment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_method DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT payment_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_status = 'success';
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_address LIKE '%New York%';
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email, user_address FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT DISTINCT payment_status FROM payments
SELECT payment_id, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE user_id = 5 AND payment_status = 'success'
SELECT user_name, user_address FROM users ORDER BY user_name ASC, user_address DESC
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments;
SELECT payer_name, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_id, user_id, amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM payments;
SELECT payment_id, amount, payer_name FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT payer_name, payment_date FROM payments ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT t.transaction_id, u.username, p.amount FROM transactions t JOIN users u ON t.user_id = u.user_id JOIN payments p ON t.payment_id = p.payment_id;
SELECT payment_id, user_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT amount, transaction_date, payment_id FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT method_type, method_details FROM payment_methods WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT user_id, transaction_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT payment_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount <= 500 AND payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND amount >= 500 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, method_type FROM payment_methods WHERE method_type IN ('credit_card', 'paypal') AND method_details->>'country' = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, card_number, expiry_date FROM cards WHERE user_id = 10;
SELECT billing_id, city, country FROM billing WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username, email, password FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT payment_id, user_id, amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_id, recipient_id, status, amount FROM transactions WHERE status = 'success';
